miabot_estimator_math_test.cc
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #include "../src/dcsl_miabot_estimator_math.h"
00002 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
00003 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
00004 #include <math.h>
00005 // above two lines allow us to use M_PI for pi
00006 
00007 using namespace Eigen;
00008 
00009 TEST(StatePropagation, noTimeElapsed){
00010         // declare some vectors to send to function
00011         double dt;
00012         Vector3d x, x_plus;
00013         Vector2d u;
00014 
00015         // x shouldn't change for dt = 0
00016         dt = 0;
00017         x << 1.0, 2.0, 3.0;
00018         x_plus = x;
00019         u << 0.0, 0.0;
00020         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00021         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00022 
00023         x << 1.0, 2.0, 3.0;
00024         x_plus = x;
00025         u << 1.0, 0.0;
00026         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00027         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00028 
00029         x << 1.0, 2.0, 3.0;
00030         x_plus = x;
00031         u << 0.0, 1.0;
00032         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00033         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00034 }
00035 
00036 TEST(StatePropagation, straightLineMotion){
00037         // declare some vectors to send to function
00038         double dt;
00039         Vector3d x, x_plus;
00040         Vector2d u;
00041 
00042         // test straight line motion
00043         dt = 1.0;
00044         u << 1.0, 0.0;
00045         x << 0.0, 0.0, 0.0;
00046         x_plus << 1.0, 0.0, 0.0;
00047         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00048         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00049         x << 0.0, 0.0, 1.0;
00050         x_plus << cos(1.0), sin(1.0), 1.0;
00051         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00052         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00053         x << 1.0, 1.0, 1.0;
00054         x_plus << 1.0+cos(1.0), 1.0+sin(1.0), 1.0;
00055         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00056         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00057 
00058  }
00059 
00060 TEST(StatePropagation, spinningInPlace){
00061         // declare some vectors to send to function
00062         double dt;
00063         Vector3d x, x_plus;
00064         Vector2d u;
00065 
00066         // test for v = 0, omega !=0
00067         dt = 1.0;
00068         u << 0.0, 1.0;
00069         x << 0.0, 0.0, 0.0;
00070         x_plus << 0.0, 0.0, 1.0;
00071         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00072         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00073         
00074         u << 0.0, -1.0;
00075         x << 0.0, 0.0, 0.0;
00076         x_plus << 0.0, 0.0, -1.0;
00077         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00078         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00079 
00080         u << 0.0, 1.0;
00081         x << 1.0, 2.0, 0.0;
00082         x_plus << 1.0, 2.0, 1.0;
00083         miabot_propagate_state(x, u, dt);
00084         EXPECT_TRUE(x == x_plus);
00085 
00086  }
00087 
00088 
00089 int main(int argc, char **argv){
00090   testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
00091   return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
00092 }
